Articles.Content:
Expancion to the stars 1.12.X

1.12 & 1.12.5

0.20.0 FINALLY ARRIVED... what?, that there are already photos?!!

and if we already have photos of the important angles from the beta (note that these photos are not from the final version) we have the photo of Gres,Frech,Nache,Grea,Eldor,Biye,Diesert,Lroos,Nart, and the April and Courye systems.

Photo album:  https://imgur.com/a/fLEkPuZ

Revelación

Lroos and nart:  https://imgur.com/LGoDGXb

Lroos contains a radius of 7,000 kilometers, it is comparable with Gres and Agasus, it also has a difference of 1,000 kilometers against Jool. and has a moon (out of 4) called nart, it also contains a complex ring system that terminates at the periapsis of the nartian orbit.

nart's photo:  https://imgur.com/Vp7ZvBB

Nart is a very lonely body that orbits Lroos, it has a radius of 700 kilometers and orbits 4,000,000 meters from Lroos. It has no atmosphere and no ice, so landing on it will be very boring, but the landscape when you are at the Lroorian rings viewpoint is seen on the horizon at day and night.

 

 

Revelación

Eldor And biye:  https://imgur.com/5LsIQPC

 

Eldor is a planet full of very notable impact craters, no, it has an atmosphere but it has an incredible mystery, its biye moon is strange because it is a simple asteroid that is locked in by the tides? It's not that noticeable, but if it's when we landed on Biye, it's almost impossible for a trapped asteroid to become tidally locked to orbiting a planet, since on average it takes asteroids 10 minutes or 50 days to spin on their axis.

Biye's photo:  https://imgur.com/atx5zDF

biye is an asteroid like Gilly, not interesting anyway.

 

Revelación

Diesert:  https://imgur.com/2sulg6j

Diesert is a planet as its name says it is diesert that has an atmosphere and very small but quite visible rings and it is said that its moon was what its rings are now, landing is worth it for its tremendously beautiful view of its visible rings

Revelación

Courye System:  https://imgur.com/nPDy7Dk

the Courye system is the initial system of the mod that contains three planets Eldor, Dieser and Lroos does not have much mystery but it is the best settlement of the systems.

Revelación

Aprif's System:  https://imgur.com/O2BIBGa

Aprif is a developing system that we don't have photos but you can see it already in the mod

install in

Mediafire

 

installation steps

1- Download kopernicus, if you already have it, continue with the second step

2- install the RAR file

3- open the installed RAR file

4- leave the normal file inside the RAR on the desktop

5- remove any version of this mod

6-place the File Expancion_to_the_stars in the KSP folder of GameData

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

planets source code  here 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Lisence here

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Attention

if you have an excessive amount of mods the package will bug and if you focus on a planet or moon the game will corrupt and auto close so for this mod make sure you don't have too many external mods

now yes, enjoy

Edited March 30, 2023 by By Antonio_YTKSP

@By Antonio_YTKSP,

1) Did you mean for this to be in KSP1 mod development or releases?

2) I know this will be a pain, but all posts outside the “International” Sub Forum needs to be in English, or at least includes a translation.    Feel free to use a service like google translate.   Thanks.  
 

3) Your mod requires a license.   If there is a license listed, see #2 above.  Please include a license here in the OP, on the download site, and the full license in the download package. 
 

4) Please include a link to any source code you might have.

Hello @Gargamel

I'm sorry the day I uploaded the forum I just wanted to sleep, forgive me if I've done something wrong I just want to know, regarding the source code I'll do it when I upload the next beta of this mod because I don't have time right now, the category is Development because it's not there finished and I only release versions of the mod Beta it is not an official release so I do not have the mod in things like CKAN or something like that, the reason why it is in Spanish is because I am South American but I translate the forums that I upload so that everyone understands them, In this case, I thank you for telling me that the language is wrong, I know that this forum has many errors, you can be sure that this will no longer happen.

Thank you.

Edited March 24, 2023 by By Antonio_YTKSP

Not a problem @By Antonio_YTKSP, I understand the need for sleep.      Get to the license and source code thing when you can.   As for the language , feel free to post in whatever language you wish, but just include a translation too.     And we’ll just move this over to KSP1 development then.

I have a problem and it is that I will have to make the systems of the mod in several separate ones because when I add more things to the mod my PC does not start the mod with many things in just one mod.

so gaseous planets like systems and some planets with many things will be put aside but the links will be on the same download page. There are also possibilities to do things like series and stories, you can also make you discover more celestial bodies and things like that.

Please don't be discouraged, I'm already finishing the Corye system and starting some others of the 7 that are going to be.

Thank you
